verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Love divine
By Christ revealed
Incarnate Love
That died for me
To Thee myself
I gladly yield
I consecrate my all to thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O Light divine
By Christ displayed
Source of all light
Who flesh became
Shed Thy bright beams
Upon my head
Burn in my heart
A constant flame

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O Truth divine
By Christ made known
All truth must
Thy reflection be
Within my heart
Set up Thy throne
And in Thy freedom
Make me free

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O Cross divine
By Christ endured
Thou cross on which
He groaned and died
And man's redemption
Thus secured
In Thy blest shadow
Let me hide

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
O Peace divine
By Christ bestowed
Thy heavenly dove
To earth come down
May He within
Make His abode
My life with His
Dear presence crown

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
O Joy divine
By Christ possessed
For which He did
The cross endure
Fill with Thyself
And make me blest
Contented restful
And secure
